info.title: API
info.description:
This is the reference section of the Fisheye Crucible common REST API.
For information about Fisheye Crucible Plugin Development, visit the
This documentation was automatically generated from the
Some endpoints (with no -v1 suffix) produce and consume payload in JSON format only.

post.description: Creates a new user. Tries to add the user to fisheye-users and crucible-users groups if those exist.

put.description: Adds user to group

get.description: Lists user's group names
Retrieve a user by name.

put.description: Updates an existing user.

get.description: Retrieve a page of projects.

parameters.name: defaultRepositoryName
parameters.description: project's default repository key part filter, optional

parameters.name: permissionSchemeName
parameters.description: project's permission scheme pare name filter, optional

get.description: Retrieves project's default reviewer users

put.description: Add user to project's default reviewer users list

delete.description: Remove user from project's default reviewer users list

parameters.name: sourceProjectKey
parameters.description: project key of reviews and snippets source project

parameters.name: destinationProjectKey
parameters.description: project key of reviews and snippets destination project

delete.description:
Deletes a project by key (including all reviews in this project).
 Use

parameters.name: deleteProjectReviews
parameters.description: if true deletes reviews in project

Get a list of recently visited repositories for the currently logged in user.

post.description: Creates a new permission scheme. The new permission scheme is blank or can be created from another existing permission scheme.

parameters.name: copyFrom
parameters.description: if set, the new permission scheme will be a copy of permissionSchemeName

get.description: Retrieve a page of permission schemes.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: permission scheme name part filter, case insensitive, optional

get.description: Retrieve a page of projects for given permission scheme.

put.description:
Add group permission [group name, action name] to given permission scheme
 List of available action names:

delete.description: Removes group permission [group name, action name] from given permission scheme

get.description: Retrieve a page of group permissions [group name, action name] for given permission scheme.
Retrieve a page of review-roles permissions [role name, action name] for given permission scheme.

put.description:
Add review-role permission [role name, action name] to given permission scheme
 List of available action names:

delete.description: Removes review-role permission [role name, action name] from given permission scheme

get.description: Retrieve a page of logged in users permissions [action name] for given permission scheme.

put.description:
Add logged-in-users permission [action name] to given permission scheme
 List of available action names:

delete.description: Removes logged-in-users permission [action name] from given permission scheme

get.description: Retrieve a page of anonymous users permissions [action name] for given permission scheme.

put.description:
Add anonymous-user permission [action name] to given permission scheme
 List of available action names:

delete.description: Removes anonymous-user permission [action name] from given permission scheme

get.description: Retrieve a page of user permissions [username, action name] for given permission scheme.

put.description:
Add user permission [username, action name] to given permission scheme
 List of available action names:

delete.description: Removes user permission [username, action name] from given permission scheme

get.description: Retrieve a permission scheme by name

put.description: Updates an existing permission scheme.

delete.description: Deletes a permission scheme by name

post.description:
Using POST method to set a user preference.
 If repo is not set, the preference will be recognised as a global preference.

get.description: Getting user's global preference
Getting user's preference related to a certain repository

parameters.name: userName
parameters.description: the username of the user to get the token for

parameters.name: password
parameters.description: the password for the user to get the token for

get.description: Provides general information about the server's configuration.
Returns indexing status of given repository.

parameters.name: repository
parameters.description: the key of the repository to get status of

get.description: Retrieve a page of repositories. Repository properties with default values may not be returned.

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: filter repositories by repository type: svn, git, hg, cvs, p4, ...

put.description:
Runs an incremental repository index.  This is the same operation as triggered by scheduled indexing.
 Can be called using the REST API Token to authorize.

parameters.name: repository
parameters.description: the key of the repository to stop

parameters.name: wait
parameters.description: if true will wait for the indexing to finish before returning

put.description:
Runs an full incremental repository index.
 For CVS: scans the whole CVS repository for any changes since the last scan.
 For other repository types will trigger an incremental index.

parameters.name: repository
parameters.description: the key of the repository to scan

put.description: Re-indexes all the Crucible revision data (which revisions have been reviewed)

parameters.name: repository
parameters.description: the key of the repository to reindex

put.description:
Rebuilds the search index data for the given repository. This will rebuild the data used to search by path,
 commit message and committer, also used for activity streams and JIRA integration.

parameters.name: repository
parameters.description: the key of the repository to re-index.

put.description:
Rebuilds the changeset discussion index for the specified repository. The index is used to display changeset
 discussions in activity streams.

parameters.name: repository
parameters.description: the key of the repository to perform the operation for

get.description: Retrieve default repository permissions properties.

put.description:
Updates default repository permissions properties.

 Valid permission settings: any combination of allowAnonymous, allowLoggedIn

Updates repository permissions properties.

 Valid permission settings: any combination of useDefaults, allowAnonymous, allowLoggedIn.

get.description: Retrieve repository permissions properties.

Note: use /rest-service-fecru/admin/repository-permissions/ endpoint for full repository permission administration functionality
 Lists groups allowed to access repository.

put.description:
Note: use /rest-service-fecru/admin/repository-permissions/ endpoint for full repository permission administration functionality
 Adds group to repository allowed groups

delete.description: Delete group from repository allowed groups

get.description: Retrieves repository updates properties.

put.description:
Deletes the existing cache and re-indexes the repository from scratch.
 For large or slow repositories this may take some time, during which some functionality will be unavailable.
 This action will also restart the repository.

parameters.name: repository
parameters.description: the key of the repository to reindex

parameters.name: clone
parameters.description: if true and the repository is a dvcs repository (git or mercurial) it will re-clone the repository before re-indexing

put.description:
Re-indexes the linecount data used to generate the LOC graphs. The linecount data will be recalculated in daily
 buckets based on the server timezone.

parameters.name: repository
parameters.description: the key of the repository to re-index

put.description: Re-scans the repository metadata. Only valid for Perforce and SVN repositories.

parameters.name: repository
parameters.description: the key of the repository to re-scan

parameters.name: from
parameters.description: the revision number to start at

parameters.name: to
parameters.description: the revision number to end at

get.description: Retrieve a repository by key. Repository properties with default values may not be returned.

put.description: Updates an existing repository.
Starts repository. Does not wait for the repository to start before returning.

parameters.name: repository
parameters.description: the key of the repository to start

put.description: Stops repository. Does not wait for the repository to stop before returning.

parameters.name: repository
parameters.description: the key of the repository to stop
